Package server

Class CustomTools

java.lang.Object
server.CustomTools
public class CustomTools extends Object
The CustomTools class provides utility methods for loading images and fonts.

  • Method Details

    • loadImage

      public static JLabel loadImage(String resource)
      Creates a JLabel with an image from a resource.
      Parameters:
      resource - The path to the image resource.
      Returns:
      A JLabel containing the image, or null if an error occurs.

    • updateImage

      public static void updateImage(JLabel imageContainer, String resource)
      Updates the image in a JLabel with a new image from a resource.
      Parameters:
      imageContainer - The JLabel to update.
      resource - The path to the image resource.

    • createFont

      public static Font createFont(String resource)
      Creates a custom font from a resource.
      Parameters:
      resource - The path to the font resource.
      Returns:
      The custom font, or null if an error occurs.

    • hideWords

      public static String hideWords(String word)
      Replaces all characters in a word with '*' except spaces.
      Parameters:
      word - The word to hide.
      Returns:
      The word with characters replaced by '*'.
